bug.description:
System information
TensorFlow version: master Doc Link: https://www.tensorflow.org/tutorials/sequences/recurrent#language_modeling
Describe the documentation issue The link <denchmark-link:https://catalog.ldc.upenn.edu/ldc99t42>https://catalog.ldc.upenn.edu/ldc99t42</denchmark-link> for " Penn Tree Bank" is no long accessible. The correct URL might be <denchmark-link:https://catalog.ldc.upenn.edu/LDC99T42>https://catalog.ldc.upenn.edu/LDC99T42</denchmark-link> , that is, upper cases for "LDC99T42"
